General.Name: GUOMAI Culture & Media Co. Ltd.
General.Description: GUOMAI Culture & Media Co., Ltd. engages in the book planning and distribution, digital content and advertising, and IP derivative and operation businesses. The company offers its products under the classics, literature, children's books, and social sciences; and produces film and television projects. As of December 31, 2021, it had 63 million Internet users and operated approximately 70 Internet product accounts. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
